original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕 열째 해 곧 느부갓네살 열여덟째 해에 여호와의 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah
in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah
which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar
